objective: Ship self-serve billing and trust ops surfaces that convert verified usage into paid revenue without enterprise sales cycles.

tickets.Summary: Persist money rail operations in Postgres
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Money rail operations and provider events survive API restart and reconcile identically across repeated reads

tickets.Summary: Wire API to durable money rail adapter
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All ops money-rail endpoints operate on durable state and existing e2e money-rail tests pass
Usage event stream is queryable by tenant and period and matches deterministic replay under repeated inputs
Invoice line-item artifacts are generated deterministically and reconcile to source usage events with zero drift

tickets.Summary: Enforce plan quotas in API gateway
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Requests above plan limits are blocked with stable quota error responses and quota counters remain consistent under retries

tickets.Summary: Implement overage billing and threshold alerts
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Overage line items appear in invoice artifacts and alert events fire once per threshold crossing per period
Pricing page renders current plan terms and passes copy review with no contradictions to billing policy docs

tickets.Summary: Enable Stripe self-serve checkout by plan
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Tenants can upgrade from free to paid via checkout and billing state updates automatically on webhook confirmation
New tenant can complete first live settlement by following documented steps and smoke script passes in CI

tickets.Summary: Ship three reference integrations for tool providers
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Three reference integrations run end-to-end in CI and each emits a verified settlement artifact
Operators can list assign and triage arbitration cases from UI with state changes reflected in API within one refresh interval

tickets.Summary: Add arbitration evidence and ruling workspace
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Rulings submitted from UI generate valid verdict artifacts linked to dispute evidence and pass verification checks

tickets.Summary: Stand up MVSV command dashboard and launch gate
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Dashboard reports MVSV funnel and launch KPIs daily and go/no-go gate auto-evaluates defined thresholds
